creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
this method is called exactly once before the build starts, this is not really
performance critical (so I object to your choice of importance).

Anyway, I've grepped through Ant's code base and am replacing all such loops,
will commit once the test have passed.

Hi Stefan,

    Sorry for the inconvenience caused. we are working on a project to apply the characteristics of previous bugs to find new bugs. We'll be more careful in in terms of the importance. 

   Thanks.
  


(In reply to comment #2)
> this method is called exactly once before the build starts, this is not really
